languageTools.program.agent.dependencygraph

Class Node<T extends Expression>

  • java.lang.Object
    • languageTools.program.agent.dependencygraph.Node<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The node type

    public class Node<T extends Expression>
extends java.lang.Object
    A Node is used to store expressions from the KRlanguage that the agent uses in a DependencyGraph.
    Author:
    K.Hindriks

    • Method Detail

      • addDefinition

        public void addDefinition(T expression)
        Adds an expression to the list of definitions stored in this node. All occurrences of expressions with the same signature should be stored in one and the same node.
        Parameters:
        expression - The expression that is added to the list of definitions.

      • addQuery

        public void addQuery(T expression)
        Adds an expression to the list of queries stored in this node. All occurrences of expressions with the same signature should be stored in one and the same node.
        Parameters:
        expression - The expression that is added to the list of queries.

      • getSignature

        public java.lang.String getSignature()

      • getDefinitions

        public java.util.List<T> getDefinitions()

      • getQueries

        public java.util.List<T> getQueries()

      • addDependency

        public void addDependency(Node<T> node)
        Adds a node to this Node's dependency list. To avoid cyclic dependencies, this node itself cannot be added to it's own dependency list.
        Parameters:
        node - The node that is added to this node's dependency list.

      • getDependencies

        public java.util.List<Node<T>> getDependencies()

      • isDefined

        public boolean isDefined()

      • isQueried

        public boolean isQueried()

      • isBasic

        public boolean isBasic()

      • getBasicDependencies

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getBasicDependencies()
        Returns the signatures for the basic dependencies of this node's expression. That is, those expressions on which the evaluation of the expression stored in this node depends that not depend themselves on other expressions, or the expression stored itself.
        Returns:
        The signatures.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this Node, with on the first line the expressions stored in this node and on the second line the list of associated queries.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of this node.
